item.title: Prairie and Atlas
item.description: With the widespread adoption and deployment of machine learning across enterprises, ever-increasing amounts of data are being collected, stored, communicated, combined, and computed over by sophisticated algorithms. In parallel, new governmental regulations and rising concerns about privacy are giving impetus to new research on how to protect the confidentiality, integrity and privacy of all this data.
